meanings.definition: The outer side, surface, or part; exterior.
meanings.sent1: The outside of the house was painted blue.
meanings.sent2: The children played outside in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch a bird from the outside of the window.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright light shining from the outside.
meanings.sent5: The outside of the car was covered in snow.

meanings.definition: The space beyond a boundary or limit; the area or region outside.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the beauty of the outside during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The outside of the park was bustling with activity.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a way to get to the outside of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His mind was always exploring the outside of conventional thinking.
meanings.sent5: The outside of the city was peaceful and serene.
